title: Installation issue: fftw@3.3.8 with intel@19.0.5 and intel-mpi@2019.5.281
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install -v fftw@3.3.8 %intel@19.0.5 ^intel-mpi@2019.5.281
     ...

     5231                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../comm
             on/n1fv_13.c(229),
     5232    ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../common/n1fv_11.c(196): war
             ning #1368: excess initializers are ignored
     5233           DVK(KP755749574, +0.755749574354258283774035843972344420179
             717445);
     5234           ^
     5235
     5236                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):
  >> 5237    ../../../../simd-support/simd-generic128.h(208): error: expression
              must have pointer-to-object type
     5238           V ti = VDUPH(tx);
     5239                  ^
     5240
     5241    In file included from ../../../../dft/simd/n1f.h(21),
     5242                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../comm
             on/n1fv_13.c(229),
     5243                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):
  >> 5244    ../../../../simd-support/simd-generic128.h(208): error: expression
              must have pointer-to-object type
     5245           V ti = VDUPH(tx);
     5246                  ^
     5247
     5248    In file included from ../../../../dft/simd/n1f.h(21),
     5249                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../comm
             on/n1fv_13.c(229),
     5250                     from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):

     ...

     5329
     5330    In file included from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):
     5331    ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../common/n1fv_13.c(241): war
             ning #1368: excess initializers are ignored
     5332           DVK(KP011599105, +0.011599105605768290721655456654083252189
             827041);
     5333           ^
     5334
  >> 5335    make[5]: *** [n1fv_6.lo] Error 1
     5336    In file included from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):
     5337    ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/../common/n1fv_13.c(242): war
             ning #1368: excess initializers are ignored
     5338           DVK(KP156891391, +0.156891391051584611046832726756003269660
             212636);
     5339           ^
     5340
     5341    In file included from ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_13
             .c(3):

     ...

     5390
     5391    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             16.c (code 2)
     5392    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             8.c (code 2)
     5393    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             11.c (code 2)
     5394    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             14.c (code 2)
     5395    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             3.c (code 2)
  >> 5396    make[5]: *** [n1fv_8.lo] Error 1
  >> 5397    make[5]: *** [n1fv_16.lo] Error 1
  >> 5398    make[5]: *** [n1fv_11.lo] Error 1
  >> 5399    make[5]: *** [n1fv_14.lo] Error 1
     5400    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             32.c (code 2)
  >> 5401    make[5]: *** [n1fv_3.lo] Error 1
     5402    compilation aborted for ../../../../dft/simd/generic-simd128/n1fv_
             13.c (code 2)
  >> 5403    make[5]: *** [n1fv_32.lo] Error 1
  >> 5404    make[5]: *** [n1fv_13.lo] Error 1
     5405    make[5]: Leaving directory `/tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw
             -3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-src/double/dft/simd/
             generic-simd128'
  >> 5406    make[4]: *** [all] Error 2
     5407    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw
             -3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-src/double/dft/simd/
             generic-simd128'
  >> 5408    make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     5409    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw
             -3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-src/double/dft/simd'
  >> 5410    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     5411    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw
             -3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-src/double/dft'
  >> 5412    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     5413    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw
             -3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-src/double'
  >> 5414    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /tmp/stas/spack-stage/spack-stage-fftw-3.3.8-hfkb3pianmghnswebswcqdclspzufsl4/spack-build-out.txt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 819, in child_process
    return_value = function()
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/lib/spack/spack/installer.py", line 1130, in build_process
    phase(pkg.spec, pkg.prefix)
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 108, in phase_wrapper
    phase(spec, prefix)
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fftw/package.py", line 202, in build
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fftw/package.py", line 199, in for_each_precision_make
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 132, in __call__
    return super(MakeExecutable, self).__call__(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/data/stas/spack-latest/lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py", line 189, in __call__
    proc.returncode, long_msg)
ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1386-0de12be
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-sandybridge
```
<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
```
$ cat packages.yaml
packages:
  all:
    # Set Intel as default compiler
    compiler: [intel, gcc, pgi, nag]
    providers:
      # Set Intel MKL as default BLAS/LAPACK provider
      blas:   [intel-mkl, netlib-lapack]
      lapack: [intel-mkl, netlib-lapack]
      fftw3: [intel-mkl]
      # Set Intel MPI as default MPI implementation
      mpi: [intel-mpi, mvapich2, mpich, openmpi]
    target: [x86_64]
  openssl:
    paths:
      openssl@1.0.2k arch=linux-centos7-x86_64: /usr
    buildable: False
  cpio:
    paths:
      cpio@2.11 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64: /usr
    buildable: False
  m4:
    paths:
      m4@1.4.17 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64: /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5/m4-1.4.17-tmumwia
    buildable: False
```
```
$ cat compilers.yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc:  /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-9.3.0-t6vopxd/bin/gcc
      cxx: /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-9.3.0-t6vopxd/bin/g++
      f77: /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-9.3.0-t6vopxd/bin/gfortran
      fc:  /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-9.3.0-t6vopxd/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@9.3.0
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment:
      set:
        INTEL_LICENSE_FILE: 28518@licence.server
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc:  /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/intel-19.0.5-2rppjg7/bin/icc
      cxx: /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/intel-19.0.5-2rppjg7/bin/icpc
      f77: /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/intel-19.0.5-2rppjg7/bin/ifort
      fc:  /data/stas/spack-latest/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/intel-19.0.5-2rppjg7/bin/ifort
    spec: intel@19.0.5
    target: x86_64
```
### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4759291/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4759333/spack-build-env.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
